bhayadassāvino.summary: (adj) seeing the danger (of); aware of the danger (in) [bhaya + dassāvī] adj, comp

samādāya.summary: (ger) taking along; taking away [saṁ + √ādā + ya] ger of samādāti
(ger) undertaking; taking up; accepting [saṁ + √ādā + ya] ger of samādāti

sikkhatha.summary: (pr) trains (in); trains (for the purpose of); practices (for the sake of); practice (to) [sikkha + ti] pr
(aor) learnt, trained oneself, practised [√sikkh + i] aor of sikkhati

sikkhāpadesu.summary: (nt) precept; instruction; training rule [sikkhā + pada] nt, comp

ti.summary: (ind) (end of direct speech) ' ' [iti > ti] ind, in comps, abbrev of iti
(ve) (gram) ti; verbal ending of the present tense 3rd person singular ve, masc

vajjesu.summary: (ptp) speaking; saying [√vad + ya > vajja] ptp of vadati
(nt) fault (of); error (of); mistake (of) [√vajj + ya > vajja] nt, ptp of vajjeti
(ptp) which should be avoided [√vajj + ya > vajja] ptp of vajjeti
